artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. leather strips alternated with metallic gold strips of varying texture and black nylon/cotton make up weft.Mount labeled H-3 (gold metallic, ochre and black)

title: Leather Cloth
